summary: This document is a law enforcement query record from September 6, 2019, showing that a user accessed Jeffrey Epstein's lookout record via a Person Lookout Query. The query was conducted at the CBP-Miami Airport Control Terminal, indicating law enforcement activity related to Epstein shortly after his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of a Person Lookout Query accessed by a user at CBP-Miami Airport Control Terminal. His TECSID is P3N06596100A01.

events.title: Law enforcement query on Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A user accessed Jeffrey Epstein's Person Lookout Query record (TECSID: P3N06596100A01) from the CBP-Miami Airport Control Terminal.

keyFacts: A Person Lookout Query for Jeffrey Epstein (TECSID: P3N06596100A01) was accessed on September 6, 2019.
The query was conducted from the CBP-Miami Airport Control Terminal, indicating border or airport-related law enforcement activity.
The document is a record of that query access, generated by a law enforcement system.
